text: Charles De Sorgher (born 14 November 1930) was a Belgian bobsledder who competed in the early 1950s. At the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo, he finished 18th in the two-man event. ==References== *1952 bobsleigh two-man results Category:Belgian male bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of Belgium Category:Bobsledders at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Living people Category:1930 births
title: Charles De Sorgher
